LUiS CiELAK
Product Design Lead

User Experience

I design with empathy and intention, crafting seamless, human-centered experiences that make technology feel effortless. My goal is to solve real problems for real people—through clarity, simplicity, and thoughtful design choices.

Interface Design

I believe great interfaces are both intuitive and beautiful. I bring structure, rhythm, and a sense of play into the visual layer—creating clean, practical designs that feel as good as they look.

Data Visualization

I turn complex data into meaningful stories. Through dashboards, visual systems, and custom reports, I help teams see patterns, ask better questions, and make smarter decisions.

User Research

Interviews, usability testing, and data-driven insights to inform and validate design decisions.

  • 50+ user interviews conducted
  • Expert in usability testing & surveys
  • Translating research into actionable insights

Select Clients

Luis Cielak

Product & UX Designer

I'm a product designer with a background in UX strategy, information architecture, and systems thinking. I help organizations design scalable, intuitive tools across enterprise and B2B workflows.

With over 15 years of experience in business, design, and technology, I focus on making complex systems more intuitive and user-friendly. My approach combines strategic thinking with practical execution to deliver solutions that truly meet user needs.

Originally from Mexico City and now based in Philadelphia, I bring a diverse perspective to every project. I hold a bachelor's degree in Management Information Systems and a master's degree in Interactive Design Media.
